name: SDIO1
description: SDIO slave interface. The MCU can be controlled via this interface.

name: SDIO2
description: SDIO slave interface. The MCU can be controlled via this interface.

name: HS1
description: SDIO host interface. Can be used to control SD/MMC cards. Supports 1-bit, 4-bit and 8-bit (eMMC) modes.

name: HS2
description: SDIO host interface. Can be used to control SD/MMC cards. Supports 1-bit and 4-bit modes.

name: UART0
description: UART serial communication interface with optional hardware handshake with CTS/RTS.

name: UART1
description: UART serial communication interface with optional hardware handshake with CTS/RTS.

name: UART2
description: UART serial communication interface with optional hardware handshake with CTS/RTS.

name: SPI1
description: Generic master/slave SPI interface, optionally can handle dual and quad SPI modes. Up to 3 hardware managed CS pins can be assigned to it.

name: SPI2
description: Generic master/slave SPI interface, optionally can handle dual and quad SPI modes. Up to 3 hardware managed CS pins can be assigned to it.

name: SPI3
description: Generic master/slave SPI interface, optionally can handle dual and quad SPI modes. Up to 3 hardware managed CS pins can be assigned to it.
